categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text:
The Lord of Agony was a Sith Lord of the reconstituted Sith Empire that allied himself to the Dread Masters during the Great Galactic War. The lord of Agony was tasked with the mission to recover the Fatality, a starship full of prototype HK-51 droids, crashed on Belsavis on a frozen lake near the Section X of The Tomb.
However the Lord was stopped and defeated by a spacer.
